member.name: T:Percyqaz.Common.Async.SwitchServiceSeq`2
member.summary: Allows you to request some asynchronous work to be done This version processes a sequence of items and runs a callback as each is completed If another job is requested before the first completes, the remaining results of the outdated job are swallowed This allows easy reasoning about background jobs and how their results join with a single main thread

member.name: T:Percyqaz.Common.Async.SwitchService`2
member.summary: Allows you to request some asynchronous work to be done If another job is requested before the first completes, the result of the outdated job is swallowed This allows easy reasoning about background jobs and how their results join with a single main thread

member.name: T:Percyqaz.Common.Async.Service`2
member.summary: Allows you to request some asynchronous work to be done, with a callback when it completes Results come back in the order they were requested
